newsitem.title: GERMANY: TENNIS-GRAF POSTPONES COMEBACK, MISSES HAMBURG OPEN.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-GRAF POSTPONES COMEBACK, MISSES HAMBURG OPEN.

text.p: Steffi Graf on Thursday postponed her comeback after a knee injury, pulling out of this month's Hamburg Open where she could have clashed with new world number one Martina Hingis.
"My long break from the game means I have to be careful about my preparations which will take a bit longer," Graf said.
"I don't want to put my good recovery in any danger by coming back too soon."
Graf lost the number one spot to Hingis at the end of last month. The Hamburg tournament starts on April 29.
